body_html:
I thought estimator random seed is set through RunConfig, not through tf.set_random_seed().
So the thing you could do here is initialize your constructor in this way:
config = tf.RunConfig(tf_random_seed=???)
clf = DNNClassifier(hidden_units=[20,20],
feature_columns=create_feature_cols(),n_classes=2, config=config)

Can you try this and let us know if it works?
body_text:
I thought estimator random seed is set through RunConfig, not through tf.set_random_seed().
So the thing you could do here is initialize your constructor in this way:
config = tf.RunConfig(tf_random_seed=???)

body:
I thought estimator random seed is set through RunConfig, not through tf.set_random_seed().
So the thing you could do here is initialize your constructor in this way:
config = tf.RunConfig(tf_random_seed=???)
clf = DNNClassifier(hidden_units=[20,20],
feature_columns=create_feature_cols(),n_classes=2, config=config)

Can you try this and let us know if it works?
